name: Water Jump
description:
The ninja want to fly just like a bird,but he is very fat,so he only can jump like a stupid.

How To Play
>tap on the screen to jump
> change the pressure you apply to the ninja to predict the jump distance
> keep playing and getting better
> this game is not easy but crazy fun

Game Features
>Crazy addicting game play
>Awesome cool to the bone interface and backgrounds
>Sleek fresh images and action
>Adrenalin rush is guaranteed
